dcterms:description: The conversational Switchboard dataset is used for training and evaluating automatic speech recognition systems, consisting of telephone conversations.
dcterms:title: Switchboard

dcterms:description: Librispeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, providing a large amount of transcribed speech data for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: Librispeech

dcterms:description: Common Voice is a massively-multilingual speech corpus that includes a variety of languages and is designed for training speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: CommonVoice German
